data.name: NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings
data.detailed_description:
ATTENTION: This is an EARLY ACCESS version of NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings. The full release is set for Q3 of 2017.

NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings is an ARCADE FLIGHT COMBAT GAME focused on rapid air battles and fast-paced missions. From a tactical third-person view or from an immersive cockpit view, fight your way to rise up against an evil Artificial Intelligence that rules the galaxy! It takes you on a breathtaking journey with beautifully handcrafted environments, battleships, and enemy fighters. Playing as Commander Eastwood on a singleplayer campaign mode, your skills as a pilot will be put to the test while you learn secrets about your sworn enemy, the Absolute Unity through completing missions on all the 3 COMPLETE LEVELS available in this Early Access version. Triple-A art and effects, and state-of-the-art sound design await.


  • FIGHT. Rapid air battles and up-close dogfighting bring your skills as a pilot to the limit.
  • GET IMMERSED. This arcade flight combat game combines a unique target lock system and intense warfare.
  • UPGRADE. Collect resources and turn your ship into an unstoppable war machine.
  • ENJOY. Revel in handcrafted scenarios with no procedurally generated content.
  • GO FULL THROTTLE. Your two wingmen will be on your side to teach the enemy a lesson they won’t forget.
  • BE A NIGHTSTAR: ROGUE WING. Scroll down for a backstory of what awaits.


What's available on Early Access:
  • Singleplayer campaign mode with 3 COMPLETE LEVELS
  • Tactical third person view AND immersive cockpit view
  • Unique target lock system
  • Triple-A art and effects
  • State-of-the-art sound design

Planned upcoming features
  • 9 complete levels with unique enemies and bosses
  • Full PlayStation®4 and Xbox One gamepad support
  • Flightstick (HOTAS) support
  • Even more weapons
  • Neat customization options
  • Dynamic open world missions
  • Steam Trading Cards and Achievements


BACKSTORY

The Independents lost The Division War a decade ago. Nowadays, the Absolute Unity rules the galaxy with an iron fist. The few Independent survivors that managed to avoid imprisonment escaped to the galaxy’s Outer Rim. There, they live in hiding in scattered outcast communities. Commander John Eastwood is a veteran of the Division War and a survivor. He still believes in the Independent cause and feels he was given a second chance to take his revenge against the Absolute Unity. After restoring an old carrier, he teamed up with Cal Adams and Dek Jackson, fellow veterans and survivors, and these three brave warriors formed the NIGHTSTAR, a mercenary group ready to take on the best paying jobs there are in the Outer Rim. The best reward? Taking down the Absolute Unity and creating a new order for mankind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
